title: Fragment, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: embossed cut velvet
dimensions: H x W (two breadths): 172.5 x 147.5 cm (5 ft. 7 15/16 in. x 58 1/16 in.)
description: Rectangle of so-called frappe velvet in deep ruby with naturalistic design of flowers closely surrounded by plumelike leafage, rising slightly above pressed ground. Selvages appear to have been cutt off. Lined and edged with galloon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk
Technique: embossed cut velvet. Gift of Anonymous Donor. 1952-166-50.
